thread.section_title: Greenwich Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Consistently excellent
thread.title_full: Consistently excellent - Review of Greenwich Hotel, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: sfbarb
title: Consistently excellent
text: I have stayed here at least about 10 times now, and every time I love it. The bed is very comfortable, the rooms are very quiet and well-laid out, the service is excellent, the aesthetic is great, the little snacks are fun, the bath products are great, the room service is always fast and delicious (and fairly priced!) and the common areas are a great place to have dinner, do work, or just have a coffee. I would say my last room was my least favorite that I've stayed in as it was the first time I've had a courtyard view (kind of odd side look into another building) and the tub was a mini-tub.
